styles.name: 职业商务照
styles.prompt: Professional headshot, business portrait, clean solid background, studio lighting, confident expression, sharp focus, 85mm lens, shallow depth of field
styles.attire: formal business attire: suit jacket, collared shirt, or professional blouse, tailored fit
styles.background: neutral solid color background (white, gray, or navy blue)
styles.pose: standard headshot pose: subject facing camera, shoulders parallel to frame, slight angle to one side, chin slightly down, confident direct gaze at camera

styles.name: 艺术肖像
styles.prompt: Artistic portrait, dramatic lighting, creative composition, fine art photography style, cinematic atmosphere, moody shadows, strong contrast
styles.attire: artistic and unconventional clothing: flowing fabrics, textured materials, creative fashion, artistic drapery
styles.pose: artistic pose: three-quarter angle, head slightly tilted, expression conveying mystery and depth, dramatic positioning

styles.name: 生活写真
styles.prompt: Lifestyle portrait, natural lighting, candid moment, authentic atmosphere, everyday setting, relaxed expression
styles.attire: casual and comfortable clothing: simple t-shirt, casual blouse, jeans, or everyday wear that looks natural and relaxed
styles.lighting: natural window light, soft ambient lighting
styles.background: natural outdoor or cozy indoor environment
styles.pose: natural casual pose: subject turned slightly to one side, relaxed shoulders, soft natural smile, comfortable body language

styles.name: 复古风格
styles.prompt: Vintage portrait, film photography aesthetic, classic Hollywood style, sepia or warm tone, timeless elegance
styles.attire: vintage style clothing: classic suit with wide lapels, elegant dress, retro fashion from 1940s-1960s, period-accurate attire
styles.pose: classic vintage pose: upright posture, formal positioning, slight tilt of head, elegant hands placement near face or waist

styles.name: 时尚杂志
styles.prompt: High fashion editorial portrait, magazine cover style, bold makeup, stylish outfit, dramatic lighting, contemporary fashion photography
styles.attire: high fashion and stylish outfit: designer clothing, trendy fashion, bold colors, fashion-forward style, runway-ready look
styles.background: minimalist studio or urban fashion location
styles.pose: fashion editorial pose: dynamic angle, exaggerated shoulder or hip positioning, confident gaze, striking posture

styles.name: 黑白经典
styles.prompt: Classic black and white portrait, monochromatic photography, timeless elegance, strong contrast, fine details
styles.attire: classic and timeless attire: formal suit, elegant dress, simple and sophisticated clothing with clean lines
styles.pose: classic portrait pose: symmetrical composition, centered position, straight posture, neutral expression, timeless dignity

styles.name: 户外自然
styles.prompt: Outdoor natural portrait, golden hour lighting, soft warm sunlight, nature backdrop, fresh and lively atmosphere
styles.attire: outdoor and nature-friendly clothing: casual shirt, light jacket, dress or comfortable outfit suitable for outdoor setting, natural colors
styles.background: park, beach, garden, or natural landscape
styles.pose: outdoor natural pose: body slightly turned toward light source, relaxed open posture, genuine smile, hands visible and natural

styles.name: 极简主义
styles.prompt: Minimalist studio portrait, clean and simple composition, neutral background, focus on subject's face and expression
styles.attire: minimalist and clean attire: simple solid-colored shirt, plain top, or clean clothing without patterns, neutral colors
styles.background: plain white or light gray background
styles.pose: minimalist pose: front-facing, symmetrical alignment, neutral expression, clean simple posture, no distractions

styles.name: 魅力写真
styles.prompt: Glamour portrait, beauty photography, glowing skin, elegant styling, soft lighting, magazine beauty spread style
styles.attire: glamorous and elegant clothing: evening dress, stylish gown, elegant top, or sophisticated fashion that accentuates beauty
styles.pose: glamour pose: soft flattering angle, chin slightly raised, gentle smile, elegant hands positioned near face or neck

styles.name: 电影质感
styles.prompt: Cinematic portrait, movie still aesthetic, film grain texture, dramatic lighting, movie poster quality
styles.attire: cinematic costume attire: movie character costume, dramatic outfit, film costume, or dramatic clothing suitable for movie poster
styles.pose: cinematic pose: dramatic angle, strong character positioning, intense gaze, movie poster-style composition

styles.name: 运动活力
styles.prompt: Sports action portrait, dynamic pose, energetic expression, athletic lifestyle, strong determination
styles.attire: athletic and sportswear: workout gear, sports jersey, athletic clothing, performance wear, or training outfit
styles.pose: athletic pose: dynamic action positioning, muscles engaged, forward-leaning posture, determined competitive stance

styles.name: 企业高管
styles.prompt: Corporate executive portrait, professional business attire, confident leadership presence, corporate environment, polished look
styles.attire: executive business attire: tailored suit, premium business jacket, professional dress shirt, or executive-level formal clothing
styles.pose: executive pose: formal upright posture, direct eye contact with camera, commanding presence, shoulders back, confident stance

styles.name: 创意艺术
styles.prompt: Creative artistic portrait, unconventional composition, experimental lighting, artistic expression, unique visual style
styles.attire: creative and artistic clothing: unconventional fashion, artistic ensemble, creative costume, or unique designer piece
styles.pose: creative artistic pose: unconventional body positioning, experimental angles, expressive gesture, unique asymmetrical composition

styles.name: 温馨家庭
styles.prompt: Warm family portrait, loving atmosphere, genuine smiles, comfortable home setting, soft warm lighting
styles.attire: warm and comfortable family attire: casual and cozy clothing, comfortable sweater, or relaxed home wear
styles.pose: warm family pose: soft welcoming posture, gentle smile, relaxed shoulders, approachable body language

styles.name: 现代时尚
styles.prompt: Modern stylish portrait, contemporary fashion, trendy aesthetic, modern photography style, sharp and clean
styles.attire: modern and stylish attire: trendy outfit, contemporary fashion, modern style clothing, fashionable casual wear
styles.pose: modern fashion pose: confident stance, slight attitude, contemporary body language, fashionable positioning, trend-aware posture
